para_P.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden declare before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic...nomination for President?
para_P.body:
Will Joe Biden declare before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the nomination from the Democratic Party for the presidency?

This resolves the same way as the original question on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will be marked as Yes if, before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement indicating that Joe Biden will neither seek nor accept the nomination from his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

For a Yes resolution, the statement must be clear and definitive: it should eliminate any possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a clear statement is not made before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will be marked as No.

Further details and background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original question is resolved, its outcome will automatically apply to this market. Users deemed trustworthy are encouraged to resolve this market early if the outcome is known and clear. Feel free to contact @jskf for early resolution requests or to report any issues.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before July 15, 2024? (a) A group of at least 5 named Dem House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th (b) Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination
question.body:
(a) A group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time). This could be by signing a letter or in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out. All five individuals must be part of the same group message. Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this condition unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date.

(b) Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be unambiguous and conclusive, leaving no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before July 15, 2024? (a) A group of at least 5 named Dem House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th (b) Joe Biden announces he will not accept the Democratic nomination
not_P.body:
(a) A group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators do not work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time). This means that either fewer than five named individuals are involved, or they do not collectively ask Biden to drop out. Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this condition unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date.

(b) Joe Biden or his campaign does not make a definitive, public, official announcement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle. The statement must be ambiguous or inconclusive, leaving room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens prior to July 15, 2024? (a) A collective of at least five identified Democratic House Representatives or Senators pressurize Biden to withdraw before July 20th (b) Joe Biden declares he will not pursue the Democratic nomination
para_P.body:
(a) A collective of no fewer than five specific Democratic Party members from the US House of Representatives or US Senators collaborate to persuade Joe Biden to contemplate ceasing his 2024 re-election bid, or to strongly encourage him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th (Pacific Time). This may involve signing a letter or another method such as a group meeting with Biden in person to jointly request his withdrawal. All five individuals must be part of the same group communication. Reports of any number of unidentified Democrats reaching out to Biden requesting him to step aside will not fulfill this requirement unless at least five qualifying names are subsequently disclosed before the conclusion of this market.

(b) Joe Biden or his campaign issues a clear, public, official statement before 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, indicating that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept his party's nomination for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle. The announcement must be explicit and definitive, leaving no possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President in the 2024 election.

question.title: Will Latvia qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Latvia does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Latvia not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Latvia does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Latvia qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Latvia set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Should Latvia fail to qualify, the outcome will be **No**.

question.title: Will Belgium qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Belgium participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If not, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Belgium not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Belgium does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Belgium does participate in a Semi-final and is officially announced as having qualified, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Belgium set to make it to the Grand Final at Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Belgium competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Otherwise, the conclusion will be **No**.

question.title: Will either Latvia or Belgium qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Belgium participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Latvia nor Belgium qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Latvia nor Belgium qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Latvia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Belgium participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Latvia or Belgium qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is it possible for either Latvia or Belgium to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if one of the following happens: (a) Latvia competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. (b) Belgium competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Latvia nor Belgium advances, the inquiry will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
question.body:
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows 10 or more Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will fewer than 10 Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20?
not_P.body:
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows fewer than 10 Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

para_P.title: Will 10 or more Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign prior to July 20?
para_P.body:
Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html

If at any time before midnight July 20 Central Time, there are 10 or more Democratic Senators, this market will resolve to yes. If not, it will resolve to no.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: Determines YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Determines NO in all other cases.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20, 2024 (b) There is another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention?
question.body:
(a) Will 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20, 2024? Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html. If at any point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows 10 or more Dem Senators, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to no.

(b) Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate? Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) 10 or more Democratic Senators call for Biden to drop out before July 20, 2024 (b) There is no other Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 Democratic National Convention?
not_P.body:
(a) Will 10 or more Democratic Senators not call for Biden to drop out before July 20, 2024? Resolution source: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html. If at no point before midnight July 20 Central Time, it shows 10 or more Dem Senators, this market will resolve to no. Otherwise, it will resolve to yes.

(b) Will there be no other Democratic party presidential debate? Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) At least 10 Democratic Senators urge Biden to resign before July 20, 2024 (b) Another Democratic presidential debate takes place before the 2024 Democratic National Convention?
para_P.body:
(a) Is it true that 10 or more Democratic Senators will request Biden to step down prior to July 20, 2024? The resolution source is: https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2024/us/elections/biden-drop-out-democrats.html. If there are 10 or more Democratic Senators by midnight July 20 Central Time, this market will resolve to yes. If not, it will resolve to no.

(b) Will there be an additional debate for the Democratic presidential candidates? This will resolve to YES if a debate occurs among potential Democratic nominees (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Otherwise, it resolves to NO.

question.title: Will Kamala's odds of winning increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is >46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise.

Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

not_P.title: Will Kamala's odds of winning not increase over the next week according to Nate Silver's model?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is <=46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise.

Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

para_P.title: Will Kamala's chances of victory rise in the coming week based on Nate Silver's model?
para_P.body:
This will be considered YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model exceeds 46.6% on Friday, August 9th at 8:40 PM. It will be deemed NO in all other cases.

Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

question.title: Will the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
question.body:
Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Will the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee not be a Woman?
not_P.body:
Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the Democratic Party will nominate a woman for President in 2024?
para_P.body:
This will conclude with a “yes” if the Democratic delegates choose a female candidate for the presidential nomination in 2024.

This will conclude with a “no” if the Democratic delegates choose a male candidate for the presidential nomination in 2024.

question.title: Will either Kamala's odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model or the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
question.body:
(a) Kamala's odds of winning will increase according to Nate Silver's model: Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is >46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise. Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

(b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will be a Woman: Resolves YES if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Resolves NO if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Will neither Kamala's odds of winning increase according to Nate Silver's model nor the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee be a Woman?
not_P.body:
(a) Kamala's odds of winning will not increase according to Nate Silver's model: Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model is ≤46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise. Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

(b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee will not be a Woman: Resolves YES if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Resolves NO if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: Will Kamala's chances of winning rise per Nate Silver's analysis, or will a Woman be the Democratic Presidential Nominee in 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Kamala's chances of victory will rise based on Nate Silver's analysis: Resolves YES if the Electoral College probability for Harris in Nate Silver's model exceeds 46.6% on Friday August 9th at 8:40 PM. Resolves NO otherwise. Link: https://www.natesilver.net/p/nate-silver-2024-president-election-polls-model

(b) A Woman will be the Democratic Presidential Nominee in 2024: Resolves YES if/when the Democratic delegates choose a female candidate for the presidential nomination in the 2024 election. Resolves NO if/when a male candidate is selected by the Democratic delegates for the 2024 presidential nomination.

question.title: Will Joe Biden die before Saturday?
question.body:
Resolves YES if there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. 

Otherwise, resolves NO.

not_P.title: Will Joe Biden not die before Saturday?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if there is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th.

Otherwise, resolves NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Joe Biden will pass away prior to Saturday?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if there is a formal declaration of Joe Biden's passing before the market closes on Friday, July 26th. 

If not, it will be deemed a NO.

question.body:
Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Will the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee not be a Woman?
not_P.body:
Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the Democratic Presidential Candidate for 2024 will be a Woman?
para_P.body:
This will be marked as “yes” if the Democratic delegates choose a woman as their presidential candidate for the 2024 election.

This will be marked as “no” if the Democratic delegates choose a man as their presidential candidate for the 2024 election.

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden dies before Saturday (b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee is a Woman?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is an official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Otherwise, resolves NO.

(b) Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a male presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Joe Biden dies before Saturday (b) The 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee is a Woman?
not_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if there is no official announcement of Joe Biden's death before market close at the end of Friday, July 26th. Otherwise, resolves NO.

(b) Will resolve “yes” if/when the Democratic delegates do not select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election. Will resolve “no” if/when the Democratic delegates select a female presidential nominee for the 2024 election.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that one of the following happens: (a) Joe Biden passes away prior to Saturday (b) A Woman becomes the 2024 Democratic Presidential Nominee?
para_P.body:
(a) This will be marked as YES if there is an official declaration of Joe Biden's passing before the market closes on Friday, July 26th. If not, it will be marked as NO.

(b) It will be marked as “yes” if and when the Democratic delegates choose a female candidate for the presidential nomination in 2024. It will be marked as “no” if and when the Democratic delegates choose a male candidate for the presidential nomination in 2024.

question.title: Will Ireland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Ireland not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Ireland does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If Ireland qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Ireland set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Ireland competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Should Ireland fail to qualify, the inquiry will conclude as **No**.

question.title: Will Luxembourg qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Luxembourg participates in a Semi-final and is then officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. For all other outcomes, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will Luxembourg not qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Luxembourg does not participate in a Semi-final or is not officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. For all other outcomes, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Luxembourg going to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if Luxembourg takes part in a Semi-final and is subsequently confirmed by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. In all other scenarios, the question will be deemed **No**.

question.title: Will either Ireland or Luxembourg qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Luxembourg participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Ireland nor Luxembourg qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

not_P.title: Will neither Ireland nor Luxembourg qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
not_P.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Ireland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Luxembourg participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If either Ireland or Luxembourg qualifies, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Will either Ireland or Luxembourg make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **Yes** if one of the following happens: (a) Ireland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, or (b) Luxembourg competes in a Semi-final and is officially acknowledged by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having earned a place in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If neither Ireland nor Luxembourg advances, the inquiry will be considered **No**.

question.title: Will Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
question.body:
Resolves YES if she appears in the movie in any role, even if it is just her voice used for a character. Will still resolve YES if she is not credited on IMDB, if it is still confirmed by independent sources. 

[image]https://people.com/will-taylor-swift-play-dazzler-in-deadpool-and-wolverine-8651310

not_P.title: Will Taylor Swift not cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if she does not appear in the movie in any role, including if her voice is not used for a character. Will resolve YES if she is credited on IMDB or if it is not confirmed by independent sources.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Taylor Swift will make a cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine?
para_P.body: This will be considered a YES if she is featured in the film in any capacity, including just providing her voice for a character. It will still be a YES even if she is not listed on IMDB, as long as independent sources confirm her involvement.

question.title: Will Deadpool & Wolverine have biggest opening weekend ever for R-rated movie? [ahead of Deadpool I & II, It, Joker]
question.body:
Analysts are projecting a huge opening weekend for "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie.
https://deepnewz.com/movies/deadpool-wolverine-set-record-360m-global-opening-weekend-biggest-r-rated-debut

"""

The film, directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds, is projected to earn between $340 million and $360 million globally in its opening weekend. This would mark the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. Domestically, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it the biggest R-rated opening of all-time.

"""

[image]The record for biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie is the original Deadpool at $284.5M ($152.2M domestic).

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will the new movie top these marks? It will probably be close...

It will certainly play at more theaters... Deadpool was a smash hit at the time, and a bit surprising.

Since BoxOfficeMojo is a bit weird on reporting international opening weekends -- it provides the raw numbers but aggregates them weirdly -- we will wait for Hollywood Reporter to let us know what the weekend opening was.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if Deadpool x Wolverine grosses more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports
-> AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release

In other words the BoxOfficeMojo numbers should be seen as unofficial until there's confirmation in the Hollywood press. And the number we shoot for is >$284.5M internationally... this weekend

not_P.title: Will Deadpool & Wolverine not have biggest opening weekend ever for R-rated movie? [not ahead of Deadpool I & II, It, Joker]
not_P.body:
Analysts are projecting a huge opening weekend for "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie.
https://deepnewz.com/movies/deadpool-wolverine-set-record-360m-global-opening-weekend-biggest-r-rated-debut

"""

The film, directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds, is projected to earn between $340 million and $360 million globally in its opening weekend. This would not mark the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. Domestically, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it not the biggest R-rated opening of all-time.

"""

[image]The record for biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie is the original Deadpool at $284.5M ($152.2M domestic).

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will the new movie not top these marks? It will probably be close...

It will certainly play at more theaters... Deadpool was a smash hit at the time, and a bit surprising.

Since BoxOfficeMojo is a bit weird on reporting international opening weekends -- it provides the raw numbers but aggregates them weirdly -- we will wait for Hollywood Reporter to let us know what the weekend opening was.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if Deadpool x Wolverine grosses not more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports
-> AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) does not report it as the record for an R-rated movie release

In other words the BoxOfficeMojo numbers should be seen as unofficial until there's confirmation in the Hollywood press. And the number we shoot for is <=$284.5M internationally... this weekend

para_P.title: Will the crossover movie featuring Deadpool and Wolverine achieve the highest opening weekend ever for an R-rated film? [surpassing Deadpool I & II, It, Joker]
para_P.body:
Experts are forecasting a massive opening weekend for the "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover film.
https://deepnewz.com/movies/deadpool-wolverine-set-record-360m-global-opening-weekend-biggest-r-rated-debut

"""

Directed by Shawn Levy and featuring Ryan Reynolds, the film is anticipated to earn between $340 million and $360 million worldwide during its opening weekend. This would establish a new record for the largest opening weekend for an R-rated movie. In the United States, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it the highest R-rated opening of all time.

"""

[image]The current record for the largest opening weekend for an R-rated film is held by the original Deadpool, which earned $284.5M ($152.2M domestically).

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will this new release surpass those figures? It seems it will be very close...

It will definitely be screened in more theaters... Deadpool was a phenomenal success at the time, and somewhat unexpected.

As BoxOfficeMojo has some peculiarities in reporting international opening weekends -- it provides the raw figures but aggregates them oddly -- we will wait for Hollywood Reporter to confirm the weekend's earnings.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if Deadpool x Wolverine earns more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports
-> AND the Hollywood Reporter (or a similar publication) acknowledges it as the record for an R-rated movie release

In other words, the BoxOfficeMojo figures should be viewed as unofficial until there is confirmation in the Hollywood press. The target number we are aiming for is >$284.5M internationally... this weekend.

question.title: Will either Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine or will Deadpool & Wolverine have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie?
question.body:
This resolves YES if either of the following occurs:

(a) Taylor Swift appears in the movie "Deadpool and Wolverine" in any role, including voice roles, even if she is not credited on IMDB, as long as it is confirmed by independent sources.

(b) "Deadpool x Wolverine" grosses more than $284.5 million globally in its opening weekend according to reports, and the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release. The previous record is $284.5 million held by the original Deadpool.

not_P.title: Will neither Taylor Swift cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine nor will Deadpool & Wolverine have the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie?
not_P.body:
This resolves YES if neither of the following occurs:

(a) Taylor Swift appears in the movie "Deadpool and Wolverine" in any role, including voice roles, even if she is not credited on IMDB, as long as it is confirmed by independent sources.

(b) "Deadpool x Wolverine" grosses more than $284.5 million globally in its opening weekend according to reports, and the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release. The previous record is $284.5 million held by the original Deadpool.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Taylor Swift will make a cameo in Deadpool and Wolverine or that Deadpool & Wolverine will achieve the highest opening weekend ever for an R-rated film?
para_P.body:
This will be considered YES if one of the following happens:

(a) Taylor Swift is featured in the film "Deadpool and Wolverine" in any capacity, including voice roles, even if she is not listed on IMDB, provided this is verified by credible sources.

(b) "Deadpool x Wolverine" earns over $284.5 million worldwide during its opening weekend, according to reports, and is recognized by the Hollywood Reporter (or a similar outlet) as the record for an R-rated movie's release. The previous record stands at $284.5 million, held by the original Deadpool.

question.title: Will Vivek Ramaswamy be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Vivek Ramaswamy not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Vivek Ramaswamy going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if Vivek Ramaswamy is chosen by the Republican National Convention to be the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will be marked as **No**. This question is open to additional candidates that may emerge in the future.

For the purpose of this question, it does not matter who holds the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is exclusively based on who is chosen by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will Donald Trump be charged with witness tampering in Georgia before June 1, 2024?
question.body: The question resolves **Yes** if Donald Trump is charged or indicted for any statements related to potential witnesses in *[The State of Georgia v. Donald J. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

This is determined by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention) and is not affected by who receives the nomination on the day of the 2024 US election. Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The indictments must occur before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Vivek Ramaswamy becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election or that Donald Trump faces charges for witness tampering in Georgia prior to June 1, 2024?

Trump, et al](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prosecution_of_Donald_Trump_in_Georgia)*. The charges must be filed before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Israel not carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Israel will execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if, after the date of this question's release and before May 1, 2024, reliable sources confirm that an assault ascribed to Israel and taking place within the territory of Iran has resulted in the fatalities of no fewer than five people.

question.title: Will Iran's Guardian Council include Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved candidates for president of Iran?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

not_P.title: Will Iran's Guardian Council not include Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name on its list of approved candidates for president of Iran?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is not included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

para_P.title: Is Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's name going to be part of the list of sanctioned candidates for the presidency by Iran's Guardian Council?
para_P.body: This inquiry resolves to **Yes** if Mahmoud Ahmadinejad appears on the Guardian Council's roster of eligible candidates for the forthcoming presidential election in Iran.

question.title: Will either of the following occur before May 1, 2024: (a) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran (b) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as an approved presidential candidate?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if either of the following occurs: (a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur before May 1, 2024: (a) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran (b) Iran's Guardian Council includes Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as an approved presidential candidate?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if neither of the following occurs: (a) Following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel and occurring within Iran's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is included in Iran's Guardian Council's list of qualified presidential candidates for the upcoming presidential election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following takes place prior to May 1, 2024: (a) Israel executes a lethal strike inside Iran (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is listed as an approved candidate by Iran's Guardian Council for the presidency?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if one of the following happens: (a) After the publication of this question and before May 1, 2024, reliable sources confirm that an attack attributed to Israel has occurred within Iran, resulting in the deaths of at least five people. (b) Mahmoud Ahmadinejad appears on the Guardian Council's roster of eligible candidates for the forthcoming presidential election in Iran.

question.title: Will Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the [Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/36a7f6a6f5a9448496de641cf64bd375) shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories:



- Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine

- Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Assessed Russian Control

- Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location



The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to:



- Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours

- Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives

- Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare

- Any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location

question.title: [Metaculus] Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democra...nomination for President?
question.body:
Will Joe Biden announce before July 15, 2024 that he will not accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25755/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will resolve as Yes if prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, Joe Biden or his campaign makes a definitive, public, official announcement to the effect that Joe Biden will not seek and will not accept the nomination of his party for another term as President of the United States in the 2024 cycle.

To qualify for a Yes resolution, the statement must be unambiguous and conclusive: it should leave no room for the possibility that Biden would accept the Democratic Party's nomination for President of the United States in the 2024 election cycle.

If such a definitive statement is not made prior to 00:00 Eastern on July 15, 2024, this question will resolve as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

question.title: Will OpenAI publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will OpenAI not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, OpenAI does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is it expected that OpenAI will release a public report detailing the findings from an external red-team evaluation of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be deemed **YES** if, on or before June 30, 2024, OpenAI makes available a *public* report containing the results from an *external* entity assessing the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will Anthropic not publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, Anthropic does not publish a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Will Anthropic release a report detailing findings from independent red-teaming of their models for safety before June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, before June 30, 2024, Anthropic issues a *public* report containing the findings from an *independent* entity red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will either OpenAI or Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, either of the following occurs: (a) OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

not_P.title: Will neither OpenAI nor Anthropic publish a report with results from external red-teaming of their models for safety by June 30, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as **YES** if, by June 30, 2024, neither of the following occurs: (a) OpenAI publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic publishes a *public* report with the results from an *external* party red-teaming the safety of one of their AI models.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that either OpenAI or Anthropic will release a report detailing the findings from external evaluations of their models regarding safety before June 30, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **YES** if, on or before June 30, 2024, one of the following happens: (a) OpenAI issues a *public* report containing the findings from an *external* entity that has assessed the safety of one of their AI models. (b) Anthropic issues a *public* report containing the findings from an *external* entity that has assessed the safety of one of their AI models.

question.title: Will Biden drop out before July 20?
question.body: If Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

not_P.title: Will Biden not drop out before July 20?
not_P.body: If Biden does not drop out and is able to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time, this market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to no.

para_P.title: Is it possible for Biden to withdraw from the race prior to July 20?
para_P.body: This market will conclude with a yes if Biden withdraws or is otherwise incapacitated from continuing the campaign before midnight Eastern Time on July 20. If he does not, the market will conclude with a no.

question.title: Will Will Hurd be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

not_P.title: Will Will Hurd not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Will Hurd is not selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. All other candidates will resolve as **No**. This question is not restricted to the candidates currently below; other options may be added in the future.

For this question, it is not relevant who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election; it is solely determined by who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

para_P.title: Is Will Hurd going to be the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if Will Hurd is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. Any other candidates will result in a **No**. This question is open to the possibility of additional candidates being introduced later.

For this inquiry, the identity of the individual who receives the Republican nomination on the day of the 2024 US election is not pertinent; the determination is exclusively based on who is selected by the delegates of the [Republican National Convention](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Republican_National_Convention).

question.title: Will either of the following occur: (a) Biden drops out before July 20 (b) Will Hurd is the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(a) Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time.
(b) Will Hurd is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who receives the nomination on the day of the election.

not_P.title: Will neither of the following occur: (a) Biden does not drop out before July 20 (b) Will Hurd not be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
not_P.body:
(a) Biden does not drop out and is otherwise able to continue the race before July 20 midnight Eastern Time.
(b) Will Hurd not be selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This is determined by who is not selected by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not who does not receive the nomination on the day of the election.

para_P.title: Is it possible that one of the following happens: (a) Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 20 (b) Will Hurd becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(a) Biden withdraws or is otherwise unable to continue in the race before the stroke of midnight on July 20 Eastern Time.
(b) Will Hurd is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. This decision is made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not based on who is announced as the nominee on election day.
